# microphone

**Type Property**

A microphone device type.

## Declaration

```swift
static let microphone: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
```

## Discussion

In iOS and tvOS, the system only exposes one capture device of this type. The audio routing subsystem decides which physical microphone to use, be it a built-in microphone, a wired headset, or an external microphone. The microphone device’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/localizedName] changes as the audio subsystem switches to a different physical device.

## Microphones

- **builtInMicrophone**: A built-in microphone.
